name: refnum
description: The primary key for this record

name: name
description: The name of the table/object tracked

name: max
description: The pre-allocated max RefNum for this table/object.

name: count
description: The size of the pre-allocation required by this table/object.

name: created
description: The timestamp for when the record was created.

name: createdETL
description: The timestamp for when the record was ETL-created.

name: lastUpdated
description: The timestamp for when the record was last updated.

name: lastUpdatedETL
description: The timestamp for when the record was last ETL-updated.

name: deleted
description: The timestamp for when the record was deleted.
